data.message: I'm a huge Eminem fan saw him in concert twice but this made me sick.  No one should draw a line like that and no one should disrespect the president no matter who he is.

replies.message: i hate trump. im a republican. trump is the biggest disgrace to ever take office. worse than nixon.
Wow you have issues then.  So if you are Republican who would you have voted for.  Certainly not hillary
I didn't like Obama or vote for him but never disrespected him.
definitely not hillary. i said i was an actual republican. not the fake one who sits in the oval office.
Really pretty sure he has made fun of Bill and said Fuck Bush... so I mean... what songs are you jammin... love the way you lie? Sit down while someone force feeds you the mmlp.
this is some dumbass shit
kkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkk ata
ahem.... at one time.... donald trump said he had no issues running on the democratic ticket.
No matter who he is?? Uhhhh ..what?
But it’s acceptable for a President to disrespect the people of the country he leads? Sounds about right.
Angela Ruger So people should not disrespect a POTUS who gives a sh*t about the people?! Get the point?
https://media0.giphy.com/media/qMaBTVTRbyka4/giphy.gif

I will never respect a president of a country that disrespects half the people in the country that president is the leader of. I'm my own person and Trump is everything I am against. No way I support a POS like that. No way.

Hun he's been disrepecting just about every race except white supremacist....not even you can compare the man Obama was to the man Trump is ...Obama didn't call people sons of bitches nor grab womens pussys, told contries to help themselves and toss paper towels at hurricane victims ..come on
Trump is a danger to society, humanity and a racist. A line must be drawn. I don't understand why you don't get that.
Trump is a bitch. I’m sorry but he is and if you honestly can’t see that he deserves all the disrespect he’s getting because of the actions he takes AS THE PRESIDENT you’re choosing to be blind.
He disrespects everyone ? Did you not listen to the lyrics while at the concerts your doughnut
Then you don't understand the concept of a democratic government lady.

Trumps a fucking disgrace and an embarrassment to our nation. Trump is a threat to world peace, security. Fuck the president of the united states of America and may he forever burn in hell, hopefully sooner then later.
Your so called president hates and disrespects everyone . Oh and 1st amendment- freedom of speech.
Trump disrespects everyone--respect is earned and he has not earned it
Your right freedom of speech.  Anyone can say what they want so I'm saying if you live in America he is just as much your president as mine.
Last I knew we are one nation under God.  You disrespect who God allows to lead you ultimately disrespect God Himself. You want to play that card go ahead
